title: Budget Insight Raises $35 Million in Funding From PSG Equity to Become One of Europe's Open Finance Leaders - Business Wire
content: Budget Insight Raises $35 Million in Funding From PSG Equity to Become One of Europe's Open Finance Leaders  Business Wire
